author: Simon Difford
description: For many, "altern'atini" is a pejorative term for a drink masquerading to be a Martini. Purists will certainly be disproving of this "Martini" but it's not so bad, and at least it contains vodka and vermouth. It's also relatively dry and certainly spirituous.
name: Alternatini
recipeIngredient: 5 ml White cr√®me de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
